meanings.definition: A large, swift African cat known for its spotted coat and ability to run at high speeds.
meanings.sent1: Cheetahs are fast runners in Africa.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of cheetahs at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The cheetahs raced each other to see who was the quickest.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like cheetahs, racing through her mind at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The cheetahs' spots help them blend into the grasslands as they hunt.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'cheetah', referring to more than one of these animals.
meanings.sent1: Look at those cheetahs running together!
meanings.sent2: Cheetahs are fascinating creatures to observe.
meanings.sent3: The cheetahs' family reunion was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The cheetahs of the savannah move as one, a blur of speed and grace.
meanings.sent5: The cheetahs' agility makes them stand out among other big cats.
